scripts.fallback: npm run ia32 && npm run x64
scripts.ia32: node-pre-gyp clean configure build --target_arch=ia32 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=1.6.2 --build-from-source && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=ia32 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=1.6.2 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell
scripts.x64: node-pre-gyp clean configure build --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=1.6.2 --build-from-source && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=1.6.2 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell
